metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10255 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
An Open Redirect vulnerability for all browsers in Jupyter Notebook before 5.7.7 and some browsers (Chrome, Firefox) in JupyterHub before 0.9.5 allows crafted links to the login page, which will redirect to a malicious site after successful login. Servers running on a base_url prefix are not affected.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10255` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

jupyter-notebook - 6.0.3-2
python3-notebook - 6.0.3-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jupyter-notebook package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.3-2').
